title: Imitations of Horace - poets are despicable if

content.question: According to the speaker, poets are despicable if they

choices.label: imitate the style of other poets
mock what is worthy of respect

content.answer: mock what is worthy of respect

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
